com.example.bacsafe
Class Main

java.lang.Object
  TabActivity
      com.example.bacsafe.Main

public class Main
extends TabActivity

Main activity for user interaction in BAC Safe. Contains Tabs for the main features of this app and is responsible for calling the other activities.

Author:
Team BAC Safe
